title: 6 Easy Steps to Register as a CEO in Grand Theft Auto V

steps.title: Launch Grand Theft Auto V
steps.content: Launch Grand Theft Auto V . Becoming a CEO can help you get money in a legal and lucrative way. Grand Theft Auto V is available to download on PlayStation, Xbox, and PC. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Buy an executive office.
steps.content: Buy an executive office. Open your phone and access the Dynasty8 Executive website. You'll need to select an office before you can become a CEO. [2] X Research source Here are the offices you can purchase: Maze Bank West : $1,000,000 Arcadius Business Center : $2,250,000 Lombank West : $3,100,000 Maze Bank Tower : $4,000,000 Once you purchase an office, you can customize it with safes, living quarters, gun lockers, and more. This can be done through the Dynasty8 website.

steps.title: Open the Interaction menu.
steps.content: Open the Interaction menu. This will differ depending on your device. On PC, press M . On Xbox , hold the View button. On PlayStation, hold down the touchpad.

steps.title: Select SecuroServ.
steps.content: Select SecuroServ . This is at the bottom of the menu. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select Register as a CEO.
steps.content: Select Register as a CEO . This will be the first option in the SecuroServ menu. [4] X Research source If you're having trouble becoming a CEO, make sure you're in a session that doesn't have a lot of existing CEOs. To check, open the player list. If a player has a SecuroServ icon by their name, they're a CEO.

steps.title: Use your CEO perks.
steps.content: Use your CEO perks. When you become a CEO, you'll be able to earn money through Gunrunning Business activities, Import/Export, and more. Other perks include: [5] X Research source Immunity from authorities with bribes Minimap immunity from other players Access to rare items, armor, and ammo Spawning vehicles at any time Hiring associates into your organization VIP missions and challenges
